title: Add "theme" options in the new client.
body: Let us choose the color of the background and other stuff, or just make different themes. My main issue with the new client is that the background is too dark, it would be nice to be able to change it.

replies.body:
riot would, but they are currently working on our new testing game mode, this is already possible to client modifaction with non riot files on the internet.

and its not dark.
